mapper.select: select payNo,payTime,payMenu,payPrice,payDiscountInfo,payDiscountPrice,payType,payMemeber,payCancel,payMemberNo from payment where payTime like CONCAT( #{date}, '%')
select payNo,payTime,payMenu,payPrice,payDiscountInfo,payDiscountPrice,payType,payMemeber,payCancel,payMemberNo from payment where payMemberNo=#{no} and payTime like CONCAT( #{date}, '%')

select payNo,payTime,payMenu,payPrice,payDiscountInfo,payDiscountPrice,payType,payMemeber,payCancel,payMemberNo from payment where payTime > concat(#{date},'%') and payTime < concat(adddate(#{date2},1),'%') order by payTime;

select payNo,payTime,payMenu,payPrice,payDiscountInfo,payDiscountPrice,payType,payMemeber,payCancel,payMemberNo from payment where payMemberNo=#{no} and payTime > concat(#{date},'%') and payTime < concat(adddate(#{date2},1),'%') order by payTime;
